Package com.nextpeer.android

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Nextpeer
    This class manages the entire Nextpeer session.
    NextpeerListener
    Callback class that you provide to Nextpeer.initialize() to get notified of Nextpeer-related events.
    NextpeerSettings
    Defines settings for the Nextpeer platform.
    NextpeerTournamentCustomMessage
    Can be used to create custom notifications and events while engaging the other players that are currently playing.
    NextpeerTournamentEndData
    Can be used to extract some info about the tournament which just ended
    NextpeerTournamentPlayer
    Represents a player within a tournament.
    NextpeerTournamentPlayerResult
    Represents the tournament results for a given player.
    NextpeerTournamentStartData
    Can be used to extract some info about the tournament which is about to be played.
    NextpeerTournamentStatusInfo
    Represents the current tournament status - the ranks and scores of the participating players.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayAlignment
    Defines the alignment of the in-game ranking display.
    NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayPosition
    Defines where the in-game ranking display notifications can appear on the screen.
    NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayStyle
    Defines the possible styles for the in-game ranking display.
